app.name: To Do
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Manage your to-do lists with Microsoft To-Do, but in a dropdown!

app.name: Discord
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Discord, but in a dropdown menu!

app.name: Spotify Web Player
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Spotify, but in a dropdown!

changelog.changenotes: Scrolling up/down on Spotify button will now change volume up/down.

app.name: KeysLocks
app.author: KazukiGames82
app.desc: This app show the current state of {Caps Lock, Num Lock and Scroll Lock}

changelog.changenotes: Buttons are now clickable to toggle each key. Changed icons to lock images. Minor bug fixes.

app.name: Droptop Store
app.author: Bunz
app.desc: Droptop store! Find all Community Apps and Themes here!

app.name: Dynamic Infos
app.author: KazukiGames82
app.desc:
this app can let you move infos into the empty space between last folder and first app

report me any bug

changelog.changenotes: Fixed logical expression error in key "Disabled" in Battery Life Time measure
Fixed Clock visibility when Custom Info is enabled and info is "None".

app.name: GSuite
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Google Search, Gmail, Maps, Sheets, Docs, Drive, Calendar, and Chat all in one app.

app.name: YouTube
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: YouTube, but in a dropdown menu! Also does YouTube Music!

changelog.changenotes: Scrolling up/down on Play/Pause button changes volume & middle-clicking on button toggles mute.

app.name: Sample WebView
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Template for creating new WebView apps for Droptop, opening any website from within a dropdown menu

changelog.changenotes: Minor bug fixes, added option to add action buttons to template

app.name: Headlines
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Get your news in a dropdown menu!

changelog.changenotes: Added buttons to main app for changing sources. Settings menu now only changes the country region. Removed Reuters and Washington Post.
Added Canadian news sources, improved UI.

Minor bug fixes
Added loading text

app.name: Quick Search
app.author: KazukiGames82
app.desc:
The dedicated app for quick searches that shows a search engine on your Droptop4.
- Switch between 5 search engines (Google, Bing, Brave, Yandex and Yahoo!).
- Customizable size.
- It is not a replacement for a browser.

app.name: WakaTime
app.author: Bunz
app.desc: Displays your WakaTime stats on Droptop

app.name: Multiples Mails
app.author: KazukiGames82
app.desc:
My version of Mail App with support for WebView :D
Added new things and now you can add up to 5 mails (Only Gmail).

- New Version with new variables,so reset settings when you install the app.

changelog.changenotes: - Fixed a lot of things about relative position and fixed error when there's not unread mails.
- Added Support for WebView Plugin (To get mail notifications on Top Bar you need login in App Settings with Username and App Password generated by Google).

- Support for 5 mails (Only Gmail).
- Preview Mails updated to 10 (Value can be changed in App Settings).

- Support for 5 mails (Only Gmail).
- Preview mails updated to 10 (Value can be changed in App Settings).

- Support for 5 mails (Only Gmail).
- Preview Mails updated to 10 (Value can be changed in App Settings).

app.name: ToolTipster
app.author: TheyCallMePapa
app.desc: Can show tooltips for all the built in apps and the icons at the top of the home menu.

app.name: PC Scanner
app.author: TheyCallMePapa
app.desc: Keeps your PC healthy to help minimize Droptop/Rainmeter crashes.

app.name: Center Infos
app.author: TheyCallMePapa
app.desc: This app will center time, song title or current app

changelog.changenotes:
Fixed issues with song titles
- song titles not updating on song change
- song titles shown on two lines
- song titles wrapped behind other apps

app.name: Translator
app.author: Bunz
app.desc: Translator that uses the Google Translator API

app.name: Hide Settings Menu
app.author: TheyCallMePapa
app.desc: I built this app after a suggestion from @Desmond Alohan.  It does what it's title says...hides the home button.  App has a toggle to show the home button without unloading the app.

app.name: Usage Monitor
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: A simple System Monitor for Droptop with official support

app.name: VPN Status
app.author: Mike Boynton
app.desc: Shows status of your VPN (connected/not connected), Displays status of vpn, location, local ip address and map with approximate location, Droptop icon changes from red when disconnected to green when connected.

changelog.changenotes: New improved vpn detection measure. Fixed small bug to convert all funny characters into proper characters. Thanks to @Cariboudjan for the regex help.
Fixed issue with dot not scaling properly, many thanks to @Cariboudjan for all his help with this.

Shows status of your VPN (connected/not connected), displays status of vpn, location, local ip address and map with approximate location, droptop icon changes from red when disconnected to green when connected.

app.name: QRes
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Select up to three different screen resolutions & refresh rates and with one-click quick swap between multiple display settings

app.name: Theme Me
app.author: Mike Boynton
app.desc:
Allows you to select a random Droptop theme and you can save up to eight custom themes and hot load them.
No need to install a custom theme again once it is saved.

changelog.changenotes: Minor cosmetic changes Added link to Droptop's Theme Builder App.

app.name: Feeder
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: RSS Feeder for Lifehacker, CBS News, LA Times, CNN Top Stories, Ars Technica, New York Times, and UN News.

app.name: Game Hub
app.author: Phan
app.desc: This is a community app to keep your favorite games organized.

app.name: Shortcut
app.author: Phan
app.desc: This is a community app that allows you to add a shortcut of any program or file in your Droptop bar.

app.name: SearchBar
app.author: Mike Boynton
app.desc: Search from a variety of search engines & stores in just a few clicks.

app.name: Color Mode Toggle
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: On compatible themes, one-click toggle switching between dark mode and light mode.

app.name: Media Control
app.author: Yaron
app.desc: Alternative WebNowPlaying media control center.Requires the WebNowPlaying extension for Chrome, Brave, Firefox, or Edge browsers.

app.name: JaxCore
app.author: Jax
app.desc:
Allows integration of Vallistart 3.0 with the Droptop home button, as well as shortcuts to YourMixer, QuickNotes, and Keylauncher from JaxCore.
- JaxCore and related modules required
- Module download links included inside app.

app.name: Quick Settings
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Toggles the Quick Settings menu (Win+A) in Windows 11, or the Action Center in Windows 10.

app.name: Disks
app.author: Phan
app.desc: Shortcuts of up to 5 disk drives and displays remaining gigabytes.

app.name: Recycle Bin
app.author: Phan
app.desc: Displays the recycle bin. The bin icon will change depending on how much is in the recycle bin. Drag & drop to the icon to delete files.

app.name: Location
app.author: notAperson
app.desc: Shows your IP and location information.

app.name: Daily Quotes
app.author: Bunz
app.desc: Shows a series of quotes, the word of the day, and an event in history that occurred on this date, updating daily.

app.name: Sample App
app.author: Cariboudjan
app.desc: Default Sample App that shows what you can achieve by creating your own custom app.
